user_query: I'm organizing a company event in New York City and I want to make it eco-friendly by using electric vehicles for transportation. Find EV charging stations near our event location using a free-form location query. Additionally, recommend a YouTube video that showcases the benefits of EVs for corporate events.

TaskList.description: Use a location query to find EV charging stations near the event location in New York City.
Recommend a YouTube video that showcases the benefits of electric vehicles for corporate events.
